metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: Prepare the Agreement and Add Fields:
Once a file is selected, the configuration page loads.
Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat Pro)

subsection_analysis.refined_text: 9. Prepare the Agreement and Add Fields: You can now add any necessary fields to the agreement.
Types of PDF forms • Interactive forms : These contain fields that you can select and fill in. • Flat forms : These do not have interactive fields.
Once a file is selected, the configuration page loads. 3.
Fill and Sign PDF Forms You can easily fill, sign, and share your documents using Acrobat's Fill & Sign tool. Types of PDF forms

Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat Pro) You can change a flat form to a fillable form by either using the Prepare Form tool or enabling the Fill & Sign tools. Acrobat and Acrobat Reader users can use the Fill & Sign tool to fill in flat forms.
